meanings.definition: The ability of a surface to emit radiation
meanings.sent1: The emissivities of different materials vary based on their ability to release heat.

meanings.sent3: The emissivities of the metal roof made it a popular choice for sunny regions.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness had an emissivities that warmed the hearts of everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The emissivities of the sun on a cold day can be felt on your skin like a gentle hug.

meanings.definition: The ratio of the radiation emitted by a surface to that emitted by a black body at the same temperature
meanings.sent1: Understanding the emissivities of different surfaces helps in comparing their heat emission levels.
meanings.sent2: The emissivities of the walls were measured to determine their efficiency in retaining heat.
meanings.sent3: The emissivities of the cat's fur compared to a black body were surprisingly high.
meanings.sent4: In the world of music, her voice had an emissivities that outshone all others.
